title: Dua Lipa catches the eye in bright green jacket and quirky top
text:
She was one of the stars gracing the red carpet at the Pride Of Britain Awards the previous evening.

And Dua Lipa was stepping out in style on Tuesday, showcasing her flair for quirky fashion as she headed out in London.

The singer, 24, dared to be different in a bright green jacket and unusual pink top with suspender belt inspired tassels.

Green with envy: Dua Lipa was stepping out in style on Tuesday, showcasing her flair for quirky fashion as she headed out in London

Dua kept the rest of her outfit super simple, dressing her look down with a pair of smart black trousers and matching heels.

She carried a cute checked handbag and styled her two-tone locks in a sleek bob.

Dua had something of an outfit change mid-way through the day, swapping her top for a simple white number.

The pop princess mixed things up with a pair of shiny silver trousers and added a pair of hot pink stilettos.

Serious style: Dua had something of an outfit change mid-way through the day, swapping her top for a simple white number and adding a pair of hot pink stilettos

Hot metal: The pop princess mixed things up with a pair of shiny silver trousers and added a pair of hot pink stilettos

She is currently in London without her boyfriend Anwar Hadid, who she has been joined at the hip with for weeks.

The couple started dating in late June, shortly after Dua's split from on-off boyfriend of five years, chef and model Isaac Carew, 33, earlier that month.

TMZ reported that 'things really started to snowball around early June when Hadid found out Lipa, who's friends with his sister Gigi, had split from her beau and 'reached out for a date.'

Sources claim the pair are renting an apartment in New York so they don't have to be apart so much.

Added drama: She carried a checked handbag and styled her two-tone locks in a sleek bob

Flying solo: She is currently in London without her boyfriend Anwar Hadid, who she has been joined at the hip with for weeks

'Dua and Anwar are spending all of their time together so it just made sense for them to rent this place,' an insider told The Sun.

Meanwhile, Dua's career has been going from strength to strength.

The I Could Be The One hitmaker is reported to have pocketed a whopping £9 million, making the equivalent of £24,000 ($29.4 million) each day through her firm Dua Lipa Limited.

Her assets are said to have increased to £11.8 million ($14.4 million) from £2.9 million ($3.5 million).

With two number one singles, One Kiss and IDGAF, under her belt, the brunette beauty has featured in fashion campaigns for Adidas and Jaguar, and recently became the face of YSL's new perfume, Libre.

Keeping cosy: Dua pulled her fluffy shearling jacket close to her chest as she braved the London chill
description: Dua Lipa was stepping out in style on Tuesday, showcasing her flair for quirky fashion as she headed out in London.
